**Timestamp:** 2017-04-26_11.35.29

**Experiment:** Minimization Trick 1

**System:**
x1' = -x1 + x1*x2 + x1*x3 
x2' = 3*x2*x4 - 2*x1*x2 
x3' = x3*x4 - x3*x1 + x2*x1 
x4' = -x3*x4 - 3*x2*x4 + x1 


**Description:** Seeking orbits by minimizing |f_T(x) - x|^2
